body:
College: Guy confesses to girl, girl excitedly told friends. Guy became a laughing stock, vows revenge.

7 yrs later: His company is on the verge of a hostile takeover of the girl's company. Girl becomes sex slave as per guy's demand. Girl's main objective was to stall him so that the takeover can fall through but she did mean what she said.
The ending is the same dude basically being notified of what has happened and saying he will make a public appearance to address the investigation.
So does the guy have a secret plan?
Hmm, so there's 2 same man in the same Timeline? Wow, a MultiVerse in the Hentai series. Or probably Alternate Timelines? Which of you guys think? Multiverse or Alternate Timelines?
w8 i dont quite understand the plot... somebody can explain to me?
